response.overview: On her road trip through Portugal, Mieze Katz, singer of the band M.I.A., demonstrates that Portuguese folk music cannot be confined to a specific genre and inspires wanderlust. During her journey, she learns how the country freed itself from Europe's longest dictatorship and what role music played in this process. Among other things, Mieze meets the inventor of the electro beat, Fado Stereossauro.
response.title: Sound-Treck Europa: Portugal
